alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:24AM EDT until April 01 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EDT FOR ROBERTSON...BRACKEN...SOUTHERN CAMPBELL...PENDLETON...SOUTHERN CLERMONT AND WEST CENTRAL BROWN COUNTIES... At 124 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bethel to Falmouth, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Falmouth, Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Augusta, Felicity, Brooksville, Morgan, Hamersville, Higginsport, Mentor, Moscow, Neville, California, Chilo, Browning Corner, Bradford, Stonewall, Powersville and Nicholsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
